Lobstruck 


Lobstruck looks at Twister, "Idiot, if they were dead then you 
wouldn't mind making their death look more honorable, and if they
have 
lived, then they shall die." A smile appears on Lobstruck face. "I 
shall leave them alone if you tell me where every base is on this 
planet. I want the names like Predacon base and Maximal base and 
anyother base. Tell me now!" Lobstruck hits Sineisis some more with 
his sword/
